He had got a lot of sleep the night be for but suddenly, he felt his eyelids drop shut. He then fell asleep. He had a brief dream, everything was black and all he heard was, "You now have the power to swap clothes. You can also chose how people react to the swap." Danny's eyes the rushed open and he looked around his surroundings. No one had noticed him fall asleep and the clock only showed that a minute or too had past.

"If I'm going to fall asleep in class, I should at least stay asleep for a while. Swapping clothes eh, I giess i should at least try it." Danny looked around at his options. The girl next to him should work. He started small, giving him her bra, and preventing her from noticing. Danny focused on her bra and shortly later. It tlelported to his cheast. he could feel it under his shirt. It fit him perfectly and was very soft. Then he gave her the bra back but focused on not having the clothes change. Danny was relieved to be wearing his own clothes again, but was quickly taken out of his comfort by most of the class laughing at Veronica and him.

"Danny, Veronica!" They heard the teacher calling.
"I don't care how funny you, or the class find it. You should not switch clothes with each other when going to school." She scolded.

"I don't know what happened, I swear we were wearing our own clothes just a minute ago." Victoria panicked.

"Same here." You said. Thinking it would be best to play along for now. After making such a mistake, you thought it best to let it play out instead of risking it and maybe making it worse.

"Go to the hallway or bathroom or something and switch back clothes now, then come back immediately." The teacher ordered.

You and Victoria walked out of the classroom together while most if the class was still laughing.

"You have any idea what happened?" Victoria asked you.

"No I don't." you lied.

"We were a couple not too long ago remember, I know when you are lying." She told you.

"Okay fine." You confessed and told her about your power and what happened.

"That is kind of cool, but you got us in trouble because you weren't careful" she said as she gave him a slight push.

"I know already." You snapped back.

"Sorry, didn't mean to upset you. Could you make me aware with your powers?" Veronica asked.

"I think I can, but I don't want to mess it up." You reluctantly admitted.

"You can do it, I believe in you." She motivated you.

You managed to successfully swap back and forth, once with her aware and once without. Which should make her aware and the stares from nearby classrooms confirmed it worked.

"Maybe I should swap us back properly, so we can get out of this mess without more trouble." You tried to reason.

"You messed up, you should deal with the consequences" Victoria tried to scold you. "And I really want to try this for a little bit, it is kind of exciting and I really miss doing stupid things together." She pleaded.

"I miss that too." You admit.
"Okay sure, but then I want us to get together again." You suggested.

"You were the one who broke up with me remember." She reminded you.

"But I regret it, I miss you."

"Then let's do that." She winked as she grabbed your hand and gave you a kiss on your lips.

You finally arrive at the bathroom and lock 2 stalls to start swapping clothes.

"I'm undressed, pass me your clothes." You said to Veronica as you handed her your clothes.

"Sure, here." She passed her clothes to your stall.

"You forgot to pass your boxers" you hear her say as you were about to get dressed.

You looked at the clothes Veronica passed to you and saw she indeed passed her panties and bra to you.

Next you started to put in the panties and bra, it took a few tries, but you saw Victoria do it a few times so you had a general idea. While the bra was tight, it seemed to fit pretty well, after all, while the clothes didn't adjust to fit, Victoria and you were close enough in size fir it to work. The panties were still really tight in the privates however, but they were soft enough to make it bearable.

Next you start putting on the dark blue skinny jeans, which just barely fit. After a little struggling you manage to slide on the jeans and close the zipper.

The pink shirt was next and it was easy to put on, but again a bit tight like the rest.

You finish putting on the scarf and the knee high black boots and attempt to walk.

After some practice you manage to walk out of the stall without falling.

Victoria was already dressed in your clothes waiting for you.
"I should have switched clothes with you earlier, you look way too cute like this." She winked at you.

This causes you to stumble a little bit.
"Let's go back before we get yelled at again."
You said. Victoria nodded.

When you get back to the classroom the teacher nods in approval and you return to your seats.

What happens next?
